flavorText: Her light touches every corner and her wings brush either wall, leaving no place for evil to lurk.

foreignData.flavorText: Ihr Licht strahlt in jeden Winkel und ihre Flügel reichen von Wand zu Wand. Sie lässt dem Bösen keine Verstecke.
foreignData.name: Verbündete aus den Ebenen
foreignData.text:
Fliegend
Immer wenn die Verbündete aus den Ebenen angreift, wage dich ins Gewölbe. (Betritt den ersten Raum oder rücke in den nächsten Raum vor.)

foreignData.flavorText: Su luz toca cada rincón y sus alas acarician toda pared, por lo que el mal no tiene donde acechar.
foreignData.name: Aliada planar
foreignData.text:
Vuela.
Siempre que la Aliada planar ataque, adéntrate en la mazmorra. (Entra en la primera sala o avanza a la siguiente.)

foreignData.flavorText: Sa lumière touche le moindre recoin et ses ailes frôlent chaque mur, ne laissant aucune place au mal pour se cacher.
foreignData.name: Alliée planaire
foreignData.text:
Vol
À chaque fois que l'Alliée planaire attaque, aventurez-vous dans le donjon. (Entrez dans la première pièce ou avancez jusqu'à la pièce suivante.)

foreignData.flavorText: La sua luce illumina ogni angolo e le sue ali carezzano ogni muro, non lasciando al male alcuno spazio in cui annidarsi.
foreignData.name: Alleata Planare
foreignData.text:
Volare
Ogniqualvolta l'Alleata Planare attacca, esplora il dungeon. (Entra nella prima stanza o avanza a quella successiva.)

foreignData.flavorText: 彼女の光はすべての角を照らし、翼は両側の壁へ届き、悪がはびこる場所を残さない。
foreignData.name: プレイナー・アライ
foreignData.text:
飛行
プレイナー・アライが攻撃するたび、ダンジョン探索をする。（ダンジョン探索をするとは、最初の部屋へ入るか、次の部屋へ進むことである。）
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — 天使

foreignData.flavorText: 그녀의 빛은 모든 구석에 닿고 그녀의 날개는 양쪽 벽을 스치고 있어, 악이 도사리고 있을 곳을 남겨 두지 않는다.
foreignData.name: 다른 차원의 동맹
foreignData.text:
비행
다른 차원의 동맹이 공격할 때마다, 던전에 진입한다. (첫 번째 방에 들어가거나 다음 방으로 전진한다.)

foreignData.flavorText: Sua luz ilumina todos os cantos e suas asas acariciam todas as paredes, não deixando ao mal esconderijo algum.
foreignData.name: Aliado Extraplanar
foreignData.text:
Voar
Toda vez que Aliado extraplanar atacar, aventure-se na masmorra. (Entre na primeira sala ou prossiga para a próxima.)

foreignData.flavorText: Ее свет проникает в каждый угол, а крылья касаются каждой стены, не оставляя места для зла.
foreignData.name: Планарная Союзница
foreignData.text:
Полет
Каждый раз, когда Планарная Союзница атакует, углубитесь в подземелье. (Войдите в первую комнату или перейдите в следующую комнату.)

foreignData.flavorText: 她的光辉遍及每个角落，双翼横展整个房间，令邪恶毫无藏身之地。
foreignData.name: 异界誓盟使
foreignData.text:
飞行
每当异界誓盟使攻击时，深入地城。（进入第一个房间，或前进至下一个房间。）

foreignData.flavorText: 她的光輝遍及每個角落，雙翼橫展整個房間，令邪惡毫無藏身之地。
foreignData.name: 異界誓盟使
foreignData.text:
飛行
每當異界誓盟使攻擊時，深入地城。（進入第一個房間，或前進至下一個房間。）

name: Planar Ally
originalText:
Flying
Whenever Planar Ally attacks, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)

rulings.text: To venture into the dungeon, a player moves their venture marker into the next room of the dungeon they are currently in. If they aren't currently in a dungeon, that player instead chooses a dungeon card from outside the game, puts it into the command zone, and moves their venture marker onto the first room.
Moving into a dungeon room will cause its room ability to trigger.
Once you resolve the last room ability of a dungeon, that dungeon is now completed and is removed from the game.
A player may only have one dungeon in the command zone at a time.
The player venturing into the dungeon chooses which dungeon they will venture into. They may choose a dungeon that they have already completed this game.
Dungeon cards are not part of a player's deck or sideboard. In both constructed and limited formats, players can use any dungeon card when they venture into the dungeon.
You can only move forward (well, downward) in a dungeon, never backwards or sideways.
Dungeons are removed from the game as a state-based action.
If you somehow venture into the dungeon while a room's ability is on the stack, you will continue on in the dungeon. If you're already in the last room, complete that dungeon and start a new one.

Choosing the dungeon or room to venture into is part of resolving the venture into the dungeon keyword action. Once that choice is made, players may not respond until after the appropriate room ability has triggered.

text:
Flying
Whenever Planar Ally attacks, venture into the dungeon. (Enter the first room or advance to the next room.)
